nodes.text: Mowgle was a low-tech agriworld in the Core Worlds, one day and three hours from Demophon with a Class 1 hyperdrive. It was responsible for much of the consumables produced for Demophon during the Galactic Civil War. Thadius Black arranged for political prisoners from Demophon to be smuggled here as cargo soon before the Demophon system was destroyed in a supernova.
